product_description: Supple leather defines a sized-down crossbody bag with plenty of pockets for organizing keys, cash, your phone and more.
product_details_and_care:
Supple leather defines a sized-down crossbody bag with plenty of pockets for organizing keys, cash, your phone and more. The adjustable crossbody strap makes hands-free carry a stylish breeze, while the logo-engraved hardware adds the perfect touch of shine.
Top zip closure
Exterior slip pocket; flap pocket
Interior zip pocket; wall pocket
Leather
Imported
Item #6097005
